LanguageData.Cyberization.AddPartBreakdown.Label: Cybernetic part breakdown
LanguageData.Cyberization.AddPartBreakdown.Text: {0}'s {1} has broken down. It will need to be repaired to restore full functionality.
LanguageData.Cyberization.Alert.Map.CantSeekPartPower: Some colonists require power for their bionic parts to work and have no means to charge them. Colonists will suffer the following effects when their energy runs out:
LanguageData.Cyberization.Alert.Map.LowPartPower.Text: Some colonists require power for their bionic parts to work and are running low. Colonists will suffer the following effects when their energy runs out:
LanguageData.Cyberization.Alert.Caravan.CantSeekPartP: {0} caravans have colonists that can't charge part power

Some caravans have colonists that require power for their bionic parts to work and have no means to charge them. These caravans will suffer the following effects when their colonist part energy runs out:
{0} caravans have colonists with low part power
Some caravans have colonists that require power for their bionic parts to work and are running low. These caravans will suffer the following effects when their colonist part energy runs out:
LanguageData.Cyberization.Alert.Caravan.PartPower.Fat: {0} will have colonists die of organ failure
LanguageData.Cyberization.Alert.Caravan.PartPower.Res: {0} will be slowed from downed colonists
LanguageData.Cyberization.Alert.Caravan.PartPower.Rem: {0} may be slowed from colonists with impaired body function
